Description: Blue glazed composition amulet in the form of a cow, with disc and lily on neck.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: G. Pinch, Votive offerings to Hathor (Oxford 1993), pp.142, 165-167, pl.1 (bottom left), 37A.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1995 Feb-May, Atlanta, Emory University, Reflections of Women in the New Kingdom
